statements: UPDATE TrafficData SET traffic_speed = 60, congestion_level = 2 WHERE route_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
UPDATE TrafficData SET congestion_level = 3, traffic_speed = 40 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-16 12:30:00' AND route_id = 201;
UPDATE TrafficData SET traffic_speed = 50, congestion_level = 2 WHERE route_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE TrafficData SET congestion_level = 3, traffic_speed = 40 WHERE timestamp <= '2022-02-15 12:00:00' AND route_id = 202;
UPDATE RouteData SET distance_km = 30.5 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE CongestionData SET congestion_level = 'low', congestion_duration_minutes = 15 WHERE congestion_id = 3;
UPDATE RouteData SET distance_km = 25.5, end_location = 'City B' WHERE route_id = 101
UPDATE CongestionData SET congestion_level = 'high', congestion_duration_minutes = 45 WHERE congestion_id = 201
UPDATE real_time_traffic_data SET current_speed = 65 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE congestion_analysis SET delay_time = 30, congestion_level = 'Moderate' WHERE route_id = 5;
UPDATE real_time_traffic_data SET traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic', current_speed = 40 WHERE route_name = 'Highway A'
UPDATE congestion_analysis SET congestion_level = 'Severe congestion', delay_time = 30 WHERE route_id = 1
UPDATE TrafficData SET speed = 60 WHERE route_id = 123;
UPDATE Routes SET start_location = 'Downtown' WHERE route_id = 456;
UPDATE TrafficData SET speed = 60.5, congestion_level = 'high' WHERE route_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE TrafficCameras SET location = 'Downtown' WHERE camera_type = 'fixed' AND route_id = 105
UPDATE traffic_data SET route_name = 'Highway A', traffic_speed = 60 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_sensors SET status = 'active' WHERE sensor_type = 'speed' AND location = 'Intersection B';
UPDATE traffic_data SET traffic_speed = 50, traffic_congestion_level = 2 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE traffic_cameras SET location = 'Highway A', traffic_data_id = 1 WHERE camera_id = 101
